LinkedIn’s suite of Corporate Solutions have helped recruiters from blue chip companies like ING Vysya Bank, Genpact and HCL reduce cost and time per hire in identifying and recruiting some of India’s best talent.   LinkedIn India is headquartered in Mumbai with offices in Gurgaon and Bengaluru.   Some interesting statistics about LinkedIn members in India:
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Canada celebrates first anniversary and appoints new Canadian country manager
description: Toronto, Canada— June 16, 2011 — LinkedIn, the world's largest professional network with more than 100 million members, today celebrates the first anniversary of its Canadian operations. LinkedIn also announced that Brian Church is LinkedIn’s new Canadian country manager.   As LinkedIn’s Canadian country manager, Church will continue to grow LinkedIn’s three lines of business – member subscriptions, marketing solutions and hiring solutions – in Canada. Church will also increase the awareness and adoption of LinkedIn in Canada by focusing on user engagement, strategic partnerships, marketing and general operations.   “We’ve heard phenomenal success stories from both our Canadian members and our enterprise customers this past year,” said Church. “In my new role with the company, I look forward to expanding LinkedIn’s presence across Canada. Our goal is to ensure that Canadians understand the benefits LinkedIn offers to both individual members and businesses.”  Prior to being promoted to this role, Church was LinkedIn Canada’s director of hiring solutions for almost a year. Church brings more than 13 years of sales experience to his new role. He previously held management and sales positions with Google Canada, Oracle and SAP.   To date, more than three million Canadian professionals use LinkedIn to build and maintain their professional identity online, make connections, get business insights and discover new opportunities.   “LinkedIn has directly affected the growth of our business and our sales leads,” said Sourov De, managing partner of Stryve Group and a LinkedIn member based in Kitchener, Ont. “As the founder of the Social Media Marketing Canada LinkedIn Group, I’ve been able to meet like-minded Canadian professionals, network with prospective clients and position myself as an expert in an impactful way.”   LinkedIn has more than 300 Canadian customers. Employers such as The Home Depot, Sandvine and SNC-Lavalin are successfully using LinkedIn’s hiring solutions to recruit top talent in Canada. Dynamic Funds and Microsoft Canada are examples of companies in Canada that are using LinkedIn’s marketing solutions to reach influential decision-makers.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn further expands European footprint with new office opening in Stockholm, Sweden
description: Stockholm, Sweden — 15th June, 2011 — LinkedIn, the world's largest professional network with more than 100 million members worldwide, today announced the opening of a new office in Stockholm, Sweden, from where a new team will provide support for its growing customer base and more than two million members across Sweden, Denmark, Norway and Finland. This latest expansion follows the opening of LinkedIn’s Paris office in March and Singapore in May, and brings the number of LinkedIn offices in Europe up to five, including London, Dublin and Amsterdam.   Ariel Eckstein, managing director of LinkedIn EMEA, will oversee the expansion of the team in Stockholm as part of his role in driving the company’s diverse business model comprised of hiring solutions, marketing solutions and member subscriptions. In the near-term, this will include a focus on member engagement, marketing, and developing customer relationships.  Commenting on the announcement, Eckstein said, “There are nearly 25 million European professionals now establishing their professional identities, building their networks and gaining access to insights and opportunities on LinkedIn. As such, we’re growing our presence to offer better support both for the members, as well as our growing customer base. The Nordics are some of the most penetrated markets worldwide in terms of Internet use, and this is reflected in their adoption of professional networking online. Our members in the region are both engaged locally and well-connected globally.”  Founded in 2003, LinkedIn is now the world’s largest professional network with more than half of its members based outside of the U.S. Roughly one million new members join LinkedIn every week, equivalent to more than one joining every second. Recent product innovations, such as LinkedIn Today and Signal, help professionals filter the growing amount of daily information and news to help them make better business decisions.   Brands such as FinAir, Statoil and Visit Denmark use LinkedIn’s Marketing Solution products to connect their products and services with LinkedIn audience of educated, affluent and influential professionals. Employers including Scania, Electrolux and Swedbank are using LinkedIn’s Hiring Solutions tools to identify and recruit top talent in Europe and further afield.   Notes to editors Top three companies in Sweden by LinkedIn membership: • Ericsson • Logica • Sony-Ericsson  Top three companies in Denmark: • Novo Nordisk • Danske Bank • IBM  Top three companies in Finland: • Nokia • Tieto • Elisa  Top three companies in Norway:  • Statoil • Aker Solutions • NTNU  Top three industries in Sweden by LinkedIn members: • IT and Services • Telecommunications • Computer software  Top three industries in Denmark: • IT & Services • Government administration  • Computer Software  Top three industries in Norway: • Oil and energy • IT & Services • Computer software  Top three industries in Finland: • IT & Services • Telecommunications • Research  Top Nordic-based companies based on growing presence on LinkedIn: 1. Ericsson (Sweden) 2. Statoil (Norway) 3. Nokia (Finland) 4. Nordea (Sweden) 5. Innspire (Denmark)
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn opens Asia Pacific regional headquarters in Singapore
description: Singapore – May 31, 2011 – LinkedIn (NYSE:LNKD), the world’s largest professional network with more than 100 million members worldwide, today announced that it is opening the company’s Asia Pacific headquarters in Singapore. The Singapore office will serve as the regional headquarters to more than 18 million LinkedIn members in Asia Pacific and Japan. Supporting existing markets in Australia and India, the Singapore headquarters will also be used as a launch pad for further regional expansion. The company’s office in Japan is set to open later this year.   Arvind Rajan, Managing Director and Vice-President, Asia Pacific and Japan, will be responsible for driving the company’s diverse business model comprised of recruitment licensing solutions, advertising sales and member subscriptions. In the near-term, this will include a focus on membership engagement, sales and marketing, and strategic regional partnerships.   Commenting on the announcement, Rajan said, “LinkedIn is a truly global network. We understand that to be a worldwide network for professionals, you need to be local and relevant to them at home. Singapore is a hub for talent, and we are establishing our regional headquarters here to serve as a gateway to the rest of the region, to enhance local market understanding, and to develop further strategic relationships.”   With more than 4,000 multinational companies headquartered in Singapore, including more than one-third of Fortune 500 corporations, Singapore’s skilled talent base and strong government support, is well-positioned with LinkedIn’s aim of connecting talent with opportunity. Seventy-three of the Fortune 100 companies around the world use LinkedIn for talent acquisition.  Recruiters rely on LinkedIn’s large talent pool to find ‘passive’ candidates - highly skilled professionals who are currently employed. These passive candidates may not be actively seeking a new job opportunity but might be the best suited for key roles. At the same time, professionals in Asia Pacific are recognising the growing importance of their online personal brand in the changing social media landscape. comScore reports that LinkedIn visitors from Asia Pacific increased by 132 percent from March 2010 to March 2011.  “These are exciting times for LinkedIn. Our membership across Asia Pacific is being driven by professionals using LinkedIn to network, build their online brand, gain insights from the community and find new career or business opportunities," said Rajan. "We intend to focus our efforts on delivering the best product experience for our members in their careers, the brand marketers who want to reach them, and the recruiters who are looking to hire the best talent,” he added.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Corporation prices initial public offering
description: Mountain View, Calif. — May 18, 2011 — LinkedIn Corporation, the world’s largest professional network on the Internet, today announced the pricing of its initial public offering of 7,840,000 shares of common stock at a price to the public of $45.00 per share. A total of 4,827,804 shares are being offered by LinkedIn Corporation, and a total of 3,012,196 shares are being offered by selling stockholders. In addition, LinkedIn Corporation has granted the underwriters a 30-day option to purchase up to an additional 1,176,000 shares to cover over-allotments, if any. LinkedIn will not receive any proceeds from the sale of shares by the selling stockholders.  The bookrunning managers of the offering are Morgan Stanley & Co. Incorporated, BofA Merrill Lynch and J.P. Morgan Securities LLC. Allen & Company LLC and UBS Securities LLC are the co-managers. LinkedIn’s common stock will trade on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) under the symbol “LNKD.”
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn to create 100 new jobs in Dublin
description: Dublin, Ireland -- March 30, 2010 – LinkedIn, the world’s largest professional network with more than 100 million members worldwide, with Minister for Jobs, Enterprise and Innovation, Richard Bruton TD, today announced the creation of 100 new LinkedIn jobs in Dublin. Available over the next 12 months, the roles will include graduate and experienced positions, with opportunities in sales, business development, marketing, customer services, finance, HR and operations. There are more than 15 roles open today.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Reaches 100 Million Members Worldwide
description: Mountain View, Calif.--March 22, 2011--LinkedIn today announced it has reached a major milestone in its development: 100 million professionals are now members of the world’s largest professional network.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn opens sales office in France as research shows half of French professionals look to change jobs in 2011
description: Paris – March 15th – 2011 – LinkedIn, the world’s largest professional network with more than 90 million members worldwide, today further demonstrated its commitment to global expansion by the opening of a sales office in France. Located in central Paris, the new team will offer local support to the growing number of French companies who use the LinkedIn platform to market to and recruit from its professional audience.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn launches LinkedIn Today to deliver the news that matters most for professionals
description: Mountain View, Calif. — March 10, 2011 — LinkedIn, the world's largest professional network with more than 90 million members worldwide, launched the beta of LinkedIn Today, a new product that surfaces the top headlines and stories being shared the most across multiple industries by LinkedIn’s trusted network of professionals. LinkedIn Today gives members a customized and tailored way to consume the top trending news relevant to a particular industry and by what is being shared the most frequently by those industry’s professionals.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Unveils New Skills Product To Fuel Professional and Career Insights
description: Mountain View, Calif. — February 3, 2011 — LinkedIn, the world's largest professional network on the Internet with more than 90 million members worldwide, today launched the beta release of LinkedIn Skills, a new product that helps members discover up-and-coming expertise areas that professionals need to succeed.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Corporation Files Registration Statement for Proposed Initial Public Offering
description: Mountain View, Calif. — January 27, 2011 — LinkedIn Corporation announced today that it has filed a registration statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission for a proposed initial public offering of its Class A common stock. The number of shares to be offered and the price range for the offering have not yet been determined. A portion of the shares will be issued and sold by LinkedIn, and a portion will be sold by certain stockholders of LinkedIn.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Appoints Jonathan Lister as Canadian Country Manager
description: Mountain View, Calif. and Toronto -- June 2, 2010 -- LinkedIn, the world's largest professional network with more than 70 million members globally and more than two million Canadian members, today made an important step in its international expansion with the appointment of Jonathan Lister as its country manager in Canada.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Names Netflix CMO Leslie Kilgore to its Board of Directors
description: Mountain View, Calif. – May 18, 2010 – LinkedIn, the world’s largest professional network with more than 65 million members globally, today announced the appointment of Leslie Kilgore to the company’s board of directors. Kilgore is the chief marketing officer at Netflix, Inc. of Los Gatos, Calif. Since joining Netflix in 2000, Kilgore has helped the company grow its subscriber base from fewer than 100,000 to more than 13 million subscribers.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: Italians get a local flavour of LinkedIn
description: Milan, Italy – April 15th 2010 -- LinkedIn, the world's largest professional network with more than 65 million members globally, today announced that the site is now available in Italian. Today’s announcement closely follows the addition of Portuguese on April 13th and continues LinkedIn’s investment in the European market. The site is also available in English, French, Spanish and German.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn launches in Portuguese and continues to expand its international footprint
description: Mountain View, Calif. -- April 13, 2010 -- LinkedIn, the world's largest professional network with more than 65 million members globally, announces today that LinkedIn is available in a fifth language, Portuguese. Nearly one million Brazilian users already have LinkedIn Profiles and there are more than 8,000 LinkedIn Groups related to Brazil.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn names A. George “Skip” Battle to board of directors and continues rapid company expansion
description: Mountain View, Calif. – April 8, 2010 – LinkedIn, the world’s largest professional network with more than 65 million members globally, today announced the appointment of A. George “Skip” Battle to the company’s board of directors. In addition to LinkedIn, Battle is also a member of the board of directors at several companies including Expedia, Netflix, OpenTable and Workday. He is also a senior fellow at the Aspen Institute. LinkedIn chose to expand its board as its membership continues to scale internationally and as it prepares to nearly double the size of its staff in 2010.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn appoints Eugenie van Wiechen as new Dutch country manager, opens office in Amsterdam
description: Amsterdam – January 6, 2010 – This week LinkedIn, the world’s largest professional network with more than 55 million members globally, appointed Eugenie van Wiechen as country manager in the Netherlands. Van Wiechen will lead the first LinkedIn office in continental Europe in Amsterdam, where she will be developing the LinkedIn offering for the more than one million members in the country.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Establishes Operations to Connect India’s Professionals
description: Mumbai, India and Mountain View, Calif. -- December 16, 2009 -- LinkedIn, the world's largest professional network with more than 55 million members globally and 3.4 million in India, today outlined its plans to connect India's professionals. The company has set up its initial offices in Mumbai at the Bandra Kurla Complex.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn appoints Clifford Rosenberg as Managing Director for Australia and New Zealand
description: Mountain View, Calif. and Sydney, Australia -- November 18, 2009 – LinkedIn, the world’s largest professional network with more than 52 million members globally and more than 1.1 million members in Australia and New Zealand, today made an important stride in its international expansion with the appointment of Clifford Rosenberg as managing director of Australia and New Zealand. Rosenberg’s long-term responsibility will be to grow the company’s diverse business model comprised of user subscriptions, advertising sales and enterprise software licensing for the Australia and New Zealand market. Near-term this will include a focus on user engagement, strategic partnerships, marketing and general operations. Rosenberg will be based in Sydney.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Appoints Hari V. Krishnan as Country Manager for India
description: Mountain View, Calif. and Mumbai, India -- November 15, 2009 –LinkedIn, the world’s largest professional network with more than 52 million members globally and 3.4 million members in India, today made another important stride in its expansion in India with the appointment of Hari V. Krishnan as country manager. Krishnan’s long-term responsibility will be to grow the company’s diverse business model comprised of user subscriptions, advertising sales and enterprise software licensing for the Indian market. Near-term this will include a focus on user engagement, strategic partnerships, marketing and general operations. For more information visit the LinkedIn blog “India is one of our fastest growing and most exciting opportunities,” said Jeff Weiner, chief executive officer of LinkedIn. “Hari’s addition to the LinkedIn team will not only help us better serve our membership and customers on a local basis, but will also help accelerate our goal to connect the world’s professionals.” Prior to joining LinkedIn, Krishnan served as country head for MySpace in India where he helped drive user growth and managed overall operations. In his more than 10 years of industry experience he also served in leadership positions at Travelguru, Yahoo! India and Cisco. He earned a master’s of business administration from INSEAD in France. Krishnan’s LinkedIn profile can be viewed at http://www.linkedin.com/in/harivk. The LinkedIn user base in India is growing at approximately 70,000 per week, runs more than 2 million searches per week and has created more than 30,000 groups to date. Currently, the company has more than 60 advertisers in India which include brands such as General Motors, Microsoft, Reuters and Tanishq.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Names Jeff Weiner Chief Executive Officer
description: Mountain View, CA — June 24, 2009 — LinkedIn, the world’s largest professional network, today announced that Jeff Weiner has been named LinkedIn’s chief executive officer and appointed to the board of directors. Reid Hoffman will remain focused on LinkedIn in his day-to-day role as founder and executive chairman.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn strengthens European leadership with addition of German language platform
description: London – February 4, 2009 – LinkedIn has today further solidified its position as the European leader in professional networking with the launch of a German language version of the site. With 35 million members globally, one person joins the network each second around the world. LinkedIn has more than nine million members in Europe, more than five times the members of its nearest competitor (1) and is the number one professional networking site in 43 European countries including the UK, Netherlands, Spain, Belgium, Denmark, Norway, Finland and Italy.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Launches New Tools to Boost HR Professionals’ Efficiency as Responses to Job Postings Double in Challenging Economy
description: Mountain View — February 2, 2009 — LinkedIn, the world’s largest professional network with more than 35 million members, today announced LinkedIn Talent Advantage, an exclusive suite of solutions for recruiters. The newest feature of Talent Advantage is a “viewer-aware” hiring technology called LinkedIn Custom Company Profiles, designed to help companies present information that is relevant based on a job-seeker’s function, industry, location, etc.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Founder Reid Hoffman Returns to Helm as CEO
description: December 17, 2008 — LinkedIn, the world’s largest professional network, today announced founder Reid Hoffman has been appointed LinkedIn’s Chief Executive Officer following the resignation of current CEO, Dan Nye. Jeff Weiner will join LinkedIn as Interim President, overseeing day-to-day operations. Weiner will remain in his current role as Executive in Residence at Accel Partners and Greylock Partners during this transition period.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Names Dipchand Nishar as Vice President of Products
description: Mountain View, CA — December 11, 2008 — LinkedIn Corporation, the world’s largest professional network, today announced the appointment of former Google executive, Dipchand ‘Deep’ Nishar, as Vice President of Products. Nishar will join LinkedIn in January and he will be responsible for overall execution of LinkedIn’s product vision globally. Reid Hoffman, LinkedIn Chairman and current President of Products will continue at LinkedIn in a full-time position as Chairman of the company, focused on future strategic direction.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: Linkedin Launches French Version and Aims to Become a Reference for French Businesses Large and Small
description: Paris — November 25, 2008 — LinkedIn, the world’s leading professional network with 31 million members around the world, is stepping up its European development with the launch of its French-language platform today. After the launch of it’s Spanish LinkedIn version in July, this latest version supports the network’s ambition to have 8% of the professional population in France (1.2 million members) — up from 4% today — and to increase its popularity among France’s large and small businesses. The French-language website is a strategic opportunity, according to LinkedIn’s founder and chairman Reid Hoffman, to “bring together the world’s professionals and accelerate their success”.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Raises $22.7 Million from Goldman Sachs, The McGraw-Hill Companies, SAP Ventures and Bessemer Venture Partners
description: Mountain View, CA – October 23, 2008 – LinkedIn Corporation today announced that it has secured $22.7 million in new funding from world-leading strategic investors Goldman Sachs; The McGraw-Hill Companies; and SAP Ventures, a division of SAP AG; as well as a re-investment by Bessemer Venture Partners. This financing is a follow on of the Series D fundraising round Linkedin announced in June of 2008, in which the company raised $53 million in funding led by Bain Capital Ventures. The valuation for the Series D was just over 1 billion dollars for the $75.7 million raised.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Launches The LinkedIn Audience Network
description: Mountain View, CA — September 15, 2008 — LinkedIn, the world’s largest online professional network with over 27 million members, today launched the LinkedIn Audience Network. Using LinkedIn’s profile-based targeting technology the LinkedIn Audience Network helps marketers efficiently reach specific audiences of influential and affluent professionals across hundreds of high quality brand-name publishers.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Launches in Spanish
description: Mountain View, CA — July 24, 2008 — LinkedIn the world’s largest professional network, has announced that they’ve launched a Spanish version of the LinkedIn Web site. Spanish-speaking users will now be able to enjoy the benefits of LinkedIn in their own language.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Secures $53M of Funding Led by Bain Capital Ventures
description: Mountain View, CA — June 18, 2008 — LinkedIn Corporation, creator of the world’s largest professional network, today announced that it has secured $53 million in funding led by Bain Capital Ventures with additional reinvestment from the company’s existing investors including Sequoia Capital, Greylock Partners, and Bessemer Venture Partners. This fourth and largest round of funding is based on the company’s rapid member growth, multiple business lines and future opportunity.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: Companies Are Now Part of the LinkedIn Network
description: Mountain View, CA — March 21, 2008 — LinkedIn Corporation, the world’s largest online professional network, today announced the launch of Company Profiles. These profiles combine LinkedIn network information with a company’s description, key industry statistics, and targeted job listings.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Launches New Corporate Recruiter Product
description: Mountain View — March 10, 2008 — LinkedIn Corporation, the world’s largest professional network with more than 20 million users, today announced a new Corporate Solutions product, LinkedIn Recruiter. LinkedIn Recruiter offers premium features and services designed to work intuitively to fit individual corporate staffing departments’ needs.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Launches New Home Page and Status Feature
description: Mountain View, CA — February 28, 2008 — LinkedIn Corporation, the world’s largest online professional network, today announced the launch of a new home page which includes a “Status” feature to allow professionals to communicate their activities to their network.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Debuts Web Application for Mobile Users at m.linkedin.com
description: Mountain View, CA — February 25, 2008 — LinkedIn, the world’s largest professional network, today announced over 20 million members can now access a LinkedIn web application via mobile devices with Internet browsers like iPhone and iPod touch, Blackberry, and other web-enabled wireless phones.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Expands its Presence in the European Market
description: London — January 24, 2008 — LinkedIn Corporation, the world’s largest professional network, today announced its expansion into the European market, with the opening of its first European operation in London, and the addition of Kevin Eyres as Managing Director, Europe. LinkedIn achieved significant international growth in 2007, doubling in size in all of its major regions including Europe, where it now has over 5 million members and is the largest professional network. In October 2007, LinkedIn signed up its millionth member in the UK, its largest market outside the US.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Introduces Intelligent Applications Platform
description: Mountain View, CA — December 10, 2007 — LinkedIn, the world’s largest professional network, today introduced the Intelligent Applications Platform enabling partners to build powerful new professional applications across the Web. LinkedIn also announced BusinessWeek as an inaugural partner with additional partners to be announced in coming months.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn’s 14 Million Members Can Now Include Professional Photo Within Their Online Profile
description: Mountain View, CA — September 27, 2007 — LinkedIn Corporation, the world’s largest online professional network, today announced LinkedIn’s 14 million members will now have the option of adding a professional photo to their online profile. Because many people can recognize and remember faces of colleagues and classmates more easily than names, the new feature will be useful to LinkedIn members as they make more connections and grow their professional networks. Photos will be available as part of individual LinkedIn profiles beginning Friday, September 28.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Network Announces Obama to Launch New Q and A Series
description: Palo Alto, CA — September 12, 2007 — LinkedIn Corporation, the world’s largest online professional network, today announced the launch of a special question and answer series on LinkedIn’s Answers service which was introduced earlier this year. The series will focus on start ups and small business, and will highlight the professional expertise available through the LinkedIn Answers service. U.S. Senator (IL) and 2008 Candidate for President of the United States Barack Obama will be posting the first of several feature questions to LinkedIn members on September 12.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Names Google’s Lloyd Taylor as Vice President of Technical Operations
description: Mountain View, CA — September 10, 2007 — LinkedIn Corporation, the world’s largest online professional network, today announced the appointment of former Google Director of Global Operations Lloyd Taylor as Vice President of Technical Operations. During his three year term at Google, Taylor was responsible for scaling the Google.com infrastructure including data centers and server operations to support Google’s post-IPO growth. His efforts helped the company scale its infrastructure by more than 500% while growing staff responsible for machine maintenance by only 80 percent.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Names Anil Khatri Vice President of Engineering
description: Palo Alto, CA — July 2, 2007 — LinkedIn Corporation, the world's largest and most effective professional network, today announced the appointment of former Yahoo! executive Anil Khatri as Vice President of Engineering and the promotion of LinkedIn co-founder Jean-Luc Vaillant to Chief Technology Officer. These two executives will lead the outstanding engineering team that is building LinkedIn’s innovative professional network.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Further Strengthens Executive Team with Addition of Yahoo!’s Patrick Crane as Vice President of Marketing
description: Palo Alto, CA — June 28, 2007 — LinkedIn Corporation, the world’s largest and most effective professional network, today announced that Patrick Crane has been named Vice President of Marketing. Most recently, Patrick was Vice President of Marketing for the Yahoo! Inc. Network Division. He was responsible for taking Yahoo! Answers to market in 2005 and for marketing the product to its position today as the #1 Q&A site on the web. Patrick also led the marketing of Yahoo! Mail, helping it become the world’s #1 web mail provider in 2006 as measured by comScore.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Names Steve Sordello as Chief Financial Officer
description: Mountain View, CA — June 26, 2007 — LinkedIn Corporation, the world’s largest and most effective professional network, today announced that Steve Sordello has been named Chief Financial Officer. Steve was most recently CFO for Tivo Inc., the creator and leader in television services for digital recorders.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Opens New Service and Sales Center in Omaha
description: Palo Alto, CA — April 25, 2007 — LinkedIn Corporation, the world’s largest and most effective professional network, today announced the opening of its new customer service center in Omaha, Nebraska. LinkedIn currently has over 10 million members and is growing at a rate of over 130,000 new members a week. The company, headquartered in Palo Alto, California is profitable and is expanding their operations. They are currently seeking more service specialists for their Omaha office.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Professional Network Reaches 10 Million Users
description: Palo Alto, CA — February 5, 2007 — LinkedIn, the world’s largest and most effective business network, today announced that Dan Nye has been appointed CEO. Nye succeeds the company’s entrepreneurial founder, Reid Hoffman, who remains as LinkedIn’s Chairman and President, Products. “Dan Nye’s depth of experience and leadership skills will allow us to accelerate our growth and take the company to the next level,” said Hoffman. “I am excited to work with Dan, both because he is an amazing executive and because we share the vision that LinkedIn will be essential for every professional in the world. Dan will build an organization that will keep up with our accelerating business.”
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Names New CEO
description: Palo Alto, CA — February 5, 2007 — LinkedIn, the world’s largest and most effective business network, today announced that Dan Nye has been appointed CEO. Nye succeeds the company’s entrepreneurial founder, Reid Hoffman, who remains as LinkedIn’s Chairman and President, Products. “Dan Nye’s depth of experience and leadership skills will allow us to accelerate our growth and take the company to the next level,” said Hoffman. “I am excited to work with Dan, both because he is an amazing executive and because we share the vision that LinkedIn will be essential for every professional in the world. Dan will build an organization that will keep up with our accelerating business.”
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Raises $12.8 Million from Bessemer Venture Partners and European Founders Fund to Accelerate Global Growth
description: Palo Alto, CA — January 29, 2007 — LinkedIn Corporation, creator of the world’s largest and most effective business network, today announced that it has secured $12.8 million in funding from Bessemer Venture Partners (Bessemer), the oldest venture capital practice in the United States managing over a billion dollars in venture capital, and European Founders Fund (EFF), Europe’s leading internet investors. The funds will support the company’s rapidly growing user base, continued global expansion and investments in new products and markets.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Premium Services Finding Rapid Adoption
description: Palo Alto, Calif. — March 7, 2006 — LinkedIn Corporation today announced that due to the rapid adoption of its premium services, the company expects to reach profitability this month. LinkedIn’s premium accounts were introduced just seven months ago and are priced between $60 and $2,000 per year. LinkedIn closed venture capital rounds of $4.7 million and $10 million in November 2003 and October 2004, respectively, and will not require any additional investment to fund business operations. LinkedIn’s emphasis for the next six to nine months will be to broaden the utility of its offerings that are free to all members.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Launches Two New Subscription Offerings
description: Palo Alto, Calif. — November 22, 2005 — LinkedIn Corporation today announced two new subscription offerings: Pro and Personal Plus. Pro accounts provide an upgrade path for recruiters, researchers, and other existing Business account holders; Personal Plus accounts enhance the value of LinkedIn for service providers, networkers and job seekers. These new premium accounts complement the Business accounts launched in August and further validate LinkedIn’s business model of providing subscription-based premium services.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Launches Premium Service for Recruiters and Researchers
description: Palo Alto, Calif. — August 8, 2005 — LinkedIn Corporation today announced the release of its fourth premium service, LinkedIn Business Accounts. Since its launch in May 2003, more than 3.3 million professionals have joined the LinkedIn Network. Users search the LinkedIn Network an average of four million times per month. Popular searches include finding business partners, former colleagues, and hiring managers. However, LinkedIn’s most active searchers are recruiters, investment professionals, management consultants, analysts, and market researchers.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Launches Relationship-Powered Job Network
description: Palo Alto, CA — March 1, 2005 — LinkedIn Corporation, creator of the world’s largest and most effective business network, today announced the release of LinkedIn Jobs, the Internet’s first relationship-powered job network. The company also announced the public availability of the LinkedIn JobsInsider™, a browser companion that informs job seekers of inside connections they have to employers when they browse major Internet job boards. LinkedIn Jobs is LinkedIn’s first premium service. It follows the preview release of a services marketplace, which enables professionals on LinkedIn to find business service providers recommended by their trusted contacts.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: LinkedIn Secures $10 Million in Series B Funding Led by Greylock
description: Mountain View, CA — October 13, 2004 — LinkedIn Corporation, the leading provider of private and effective professional networking tools, today announced that it has secured $10 million in Series B funding. The investment was led by Greylock, the early-stage venture capital firm that has produced the largest number of initial public offerings. Of the over 250 companies Greylock has funded, 120 are now publicly held.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: Sequoia Capital "Links In" with $4.7 Million Investment
description: Mountain View, CA — November 12, 2003 — LinkedIn, the premier provider of professional networking tools for hiring managers, job seekers and professional service providers, today announced that it has secured Series A financing of $4.7 million. The investment was led by Sequoia Capital, the venture investors behind well-known Internet brands such as Yahoo!, Google and PayPal. Sequoia Capital is also an investor in Plaxo, the leading contact updating tool.
author: LinkedIn Corporate Communications

title: The power of LinkedIn’s 500 million member community
description: We recently crossed an important and exciting milestone. We now have half a billion members in 200 countries connecting, and engaging with one another in professional conversations and finding opportunities through these connections on LinkedIn.

title: Celebrate Earth: Sustainability at LinkedIn
description: We believe that how we work is just as important as what we do in creating economic opportunity for every member of the global workforce. It’s important for us to keep sustainable business practices top-of-mind when we think about our corporate social responsibility, and we're committed to do our part to reduce the carbon footprint.

title: LinkedIn data shows the most promising jobs in the healthcare, finance, and software and IT industries
description: We analyzed LinkedIn data to find the Most Promising Jobs in the healthcare, finance and software & IT industries. To create these lists, we looked at the careers on LinkedIn with high median salaries, healthy job openings and year-over-year growth, and the jobs most likely to lead to a promotion or advancement within an organization.

title: Introducing audience demographics: see who you're reaching when you post content on LinkedIn
description: Millions of professionals come to LinkedIn every day to share news, ideas, and perspectives. Posting to the LinkedIn feed provides a gateway to meaningful conversations with the people that matter most to your career. Today, we’re rolling out new insights on mobile to make it easier for you to understand who is seeing your posts on the world’s largest professional network.

title: More than 100 million professionals in Asia Pacific now connected on LinkedIn
description: SINGAPORE — August 10, 2016 — LinkedIn (NYSE:LNKD), the world’s largest professional network today celebrated crossing the 100-million member mark in the Asia Pacific region (APAC), a doubling of its member base in two years. The region now represents 22 percent of LinkedIn’s global member base of over 450 million.

title: LinkedIn's first data centre outside of the U.S. comes online in Singapore
description: SINGAPORE, April 6, 2016 – LinkedIn (NYSE:LNKD), the world’s largest professional network with more than 414 million members globally, today unveiled its first data centre outside of the US, in Singapore. The new data centre, spanning 23,500 square feet in Jurong, is one of six data centres for LinkedIn globally. LinkedIn has invested SGD $80 million so far in the new data centre, which was established to enhance the experience for the fast-growing base of LinkedIn members and clients across the Asia Pacific region, including speed and reliability of access to LinkedIn’s services as they connect to professional opportunities on the network.
